alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 415 PM PDT... At 327 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 10 miles northwest of Gibbs Ranch, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain City, Charleston, Jarbidge, Montello, Gibbs Ranch, Jackpot, Contact, Hd Summit, North Fork and Wild Horse Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
